title: I dont get key fragments for a while
body: I just played a lot of matches ~1 mounth~ AND I DONT GET ANY KEYS FRAGMENTS PLS FIX THIS !

replies.body:
I haven't seen any issues with getting hextech key fragments, but I looked into your specific issue to be sure.  I was able to see a very consistent stream of fragments and turning them into keys of the course of last month.  

Per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, the drop rate decreases as you continue to get more until it resets roughly ever 28 days.  Hang tight and you'll start seeing a solid increase in drops again.  Hopefully that helps clear some things up!
